item.title: Temperature Functions
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

I got bored and made these, I hope they are right cause I didn’t feel like looking them up :o

Not a script but here you go:

[code]Function FahrenheitToCelsius(FTemp:extended):extended;
begin
result:=(Ftemp-32) Div 1.8;
end;

Function CelsiusToFahrenheit(CTemp:extended):extended;
begin
result:=(Ctemp*1.8)+32
end;

Function CelsiusToKelvins(Ctemp:extended):extended;
begin
result:=Ctemp+273.15;
end;

Function KelvinsToCelsius(KTemp:extended):extended;
begin
result:=Ktemp-273.15;
end;

Function FahrenheitToKelvins(FTemp:extended):extended;
var
i:extended;
begin
i:=FahrenheitToCelsius(Ftemp)
result:=CelsiusToKelvins(i);
end;

Function KelvinsToFahrenheit(KTemp:extended):extended;
var
i:extended;
begin
i:=KelvinsToCelsius(KTemp);
result:=CelsiusToFahrenheit(i);
end;[/code]

Note I didn’t include Reaumur scale because it is obsolete in the world of science and to me also.

Have fun

Read full topic
